name: ACROBATICS
description: Ability to traverse narrow or treacherous surfaces

name: APPRAISE
description: Evaluate the monetary value of an object

name: BLUFF
description: Skill to lie

name: CLIMB
description: Ability to scale vertical surfaces from smooth city walls to rocky cliffs

name: CRAFT1
description: Skill to craft a specific group of items

name: CRAFT2
description: Skill to craft a specific group of items

name: CRAFT3
description: Skill to craft a specific group of items

name: DIPLOMACY
description: Skill to persuade others

name: DISABLE_DEVICE
description: Skill to disarm traps and open locks

name: ESCAPE_ARTIST
description: Skill to slip out of bonds and escape from grapples

name: FLY
description: Skill to perform daring or complex airborne maneuvers -- Note - This skill does not give you the ability to fly

name: HANDLE_ANIMAL
description: Skill with animals, including tricks and simple commands

name: HEAL
description: Skill tending to wounds and ailments

name: INTIMIDATE
description: Skill to frighten others to act in a way that benefits you

name: KNOWLEDGE_ARCANA
description: Knolwedge of ancient mysteries, magic traditions, arcane symbols, constructs, dragons, and magical beasts

name: KNOWLEDGE_DUNGEONEERING
description: Knowldge of aberrations, caverns, oozes, and spelunking

name: KNOWLEDGE_ENGINEERING
description: Knowldge of buildings, aqueducts, bridges, and fortifications

name: KNOWLEDGE_GEOGRAPHY
description: Knowldge of lands, terrain, climate, and people

name: KNOWLEDGE_HISTORY
description: Knowldge of wars, colonies, migrations, and founding of cities

name: KNOWLEDGE_LOCAL
description: Knowldge of legends, personalities, inhabitants, laws, customs, traditions, and humanoids

name: KNOWLEDGE_NATURE
description: Knowldge of animals, fey, monstrous humanoids, plants, seasons and cycles, weather, and vermin

name: KNOWLEDGE_NOBILITY
description: Knowldge of lineages, heraldry, personalities, and royalty

name: KNOWLEDGE_PLANES
description: Knowldge of the Inner Planes, the Outer Planes, the Astral Plane, the Ethereal Plane, outsiders, and planar magic

name: KNOWLEDGE_RELIGION
description: Knowldge of gods and goddesses, mythic history, ecclesiastic tradition, holy symbols, and undead

name: LINGUISTICS
description: Skill working with languages

name: PERCEPTION
description: Sense to notice finer details and alert you to danger

name: PERFORM1
description: Skill in a form of entertainment

name: PERFORM2
description: Skill in a form of entertainment

name: PROFESSION1
description: Skill in a specific job

name: PROFESSION2
description: Skill in a specific job

name: RIDE
description: Skill to ride animals

name: SENSE_MOTIVE
description: Skill to detect falsehood and true intentions

name: SLIGHT_OF_HAND
description: Skill to pick pockets, draw hidden weapons, and take a variety of actions without being noticed

name: SPELLCRAFT
description: Skill at the art of casting spells, identifying magic items, crafting magic items, and identifying spells as they are being cast

name: STEALTH
description: Skill at avoiding detection, allowing you to slip past foes or strike from an unseen position

name: SURVIVAL
description: Skill to navigate the wilderness

name: SWIM
description: Skill to swim

name: USE_MAGICAL_DEVICE
description: Skill to activate magical items
